Package player.aiHelper

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    AINode
    Interface for node of game tree
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    AbstractGameState
    An AbstractGameState is a representation of the state of the game that implements AINode and all of the node related methods e.g score()
    AIHelper
    Provides helper methods for the AIs, mostly about shortest distances using Dijkstra's algorithm, methods for calculating MrX's possible locations
    AlphaBeta
    Minimax with Alphabeta Further pruning is done by applying specific rules to moves and filtering the moves that are not useful in any way.
    DetectiveAIGameState  
    Dijkstra
    Implementation of Dijkstra's algorithm using a priority queue
    Expectiminimax  
    Minimax
    Simple minimax algorithm with no optimisations.
    MoveFilterer  
    MyAIGameState  
  • Enum Summary 
    Enum Description
    Minimax.AIType
